6764BB2C.Line3.11E336: I sure hope nothing's happened to it. Help me look around, will you?

8EE1116A.Line1.11E336: So, uh... as I was saying, I don't know precisely where it's hidden. But this is the place. So it should be buried around here somewhere.

B79AE6F9.VoiceDir3.11E336: Faking sincerity and concern while gently encouraging the player to help him.

DF173D37.Emphasis on: :  Faking sincerity and trying to be amicable, encouraging to the player.
